pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Solver for Parameterized Linear Programming Problems and Constrained L1 Minimization Approach to Sparse Precision Matrix Estimation // An efficient method of recovering precision matrices by applying the parametric simplex method is provided in this package. The computation is based on a linear optimization solver. It also contains a generic Linear Programming solver and a parameterized Linear Programming solver based on the parametric simplex method.
